title: GPT-RAG

title: LLM Fine-Tuning on Azure
description: End‑to‑end toolkit for customizing Azure OpenAI or open‑source LLMs using domain‑specific data. Includes no‑code and code paths, evaluation scripts, and deployment pipelines. Enables safer and more accurate tailored model performance for enterprise workflows.

title: Document Processing Accelerator
description: Modular pipeline for extracting, classifying, summarizing, and indexing unstructured documents at scale. Integrates OCR, Azure AI, and search for automated ingestion and retrieval. Reduces manual processing friction across claims, invoices, contracts, and records.

title: AI Landing Zones
description: Secure, standardized foundation for deploying AI workloads using Well‑Architected and Cloud Adoption Framework guidance. Automates infra provisioning, governance, networking, and compliance. Accelerates production‑ready AI environments across industries.

title: Copilot Studio
description: Unified approach to building secure, scalable enterprise copilots using low‑code Copilot Studio and Azure AI services. Supports rapid prototyping, orchestration, and integration with enterprise systems. Enables fusion teams to deliver task‑specific copilots quickly.

title: Multi‑Agent Banking Assistant (Agent Sample)
description: Conversational multi‑agent banking assistant integrating securely with core systems. Supports account inquiries, transactions, payments, and dispute initiation. Enables compliant and extensible digital banking experiences.

title: Investment Analysis Multi-Agent System (Online)

description: Multi‑agent investment analysis workflow using the Microsoft Agent Framework. Automates due‑diligence synthesis, competitive analysis, and risk scoring. Produces investor‑ready summaries for PE/VC, corporate development, and strategic finance teams.

title: AgentRob - Real-time AI Workshop Co-Host
description: Real-time AI co-host application for enterprise workshops using Azure OpenAI. Features voice and text interaction, workshop facilitation, and engagement prompts for training sessions on AI apps and agents.
